## PropertyStyleSheetBehavior.bind() method

Binds the behavior to the element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bind(elementInstance: FASTElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elementInstance | [FASTElement](./fast-element.fastelement.md) | The element for which the property is applied. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
